Package com.crudetech.geometry.geom

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MatrixColumn
    When implemented it represents a matrix column index.
    MatrixRow  
    ToleranceComparable<TolComp extends ToleranceComparable<TolComp>>
    Implemented by all geometric objects in this package, demonstrating their tolerance based equality handling.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractToleranceComparable<TolComp extends ToleranceComparable<TolComp>>
    Convenience base class that takes care of implementing Object.hashCode() and Object.equals(Object) correctly for a ToleranceComparable implementation.
    FloatCompare
    Helper class to interact with floating point types.
    Matrix
    A set of basic matrix operations that serve as a workhorse for concrete implementations such as Matrix2d or Matrix3d.
    RadianAngles
    This class offers a convenient set of standard angles and angle related constants that will enhance the readability of your code significantly.
    Tolerance
    Represents the tolerance for all necessary floating point comparisons.
    ToleranceComparer<T extends ToleranceComparable<T>>
